resources.string: Hi there. I\'m Anirban. Welcome to my basic app

Hi, here is a simple game. 
We all love play ludo. 
All of us played ludo many times. 
Thus we can use a virtual dice roller may be helpful when the real one is unavailable. 
Since the real one so tiny, we often lose it, i tried to help a real bit with this virtual one :) 
Let's dive into the game. 
Enjoy.
